name: StreamTransport
short_description: StreamTransport is able to browse and download video clips from video hosting websites of HTTP, RTMP, RTMPT, RTMPE, RTMPTE protocol, and these cover overwhelming majority of websites such as Hulu, FC2, Veoh, Boxee, Joost, YouTube, Yahoo Video, CBS, etc. You are able to highlight and download any videos from the detected URL list. There is no bother to add URL to create a download task manually. The videos will be saved as FLV or MP4 format. By clicking play button on the Download window, you can play the FLV with your system default player. The task manager lists detailed information of files such as name, size, progress, location etc and allows you to play, stop, and delete the FLV files downloaded.
summary: Download from hulu, fc2, yahoo, youtube, and more video sharing sites
